title: pixel 3a keyboard upgrade flaws.
content:
about 2 weeks ago my microphone icon disappeared from my keyboard on my 3a. I could no longer voice text to sms or email. Calls to T mobile support failed to find a solution. my own search of settings also failed to find a choice.

From google support on the smartphone, I was guided to the G 3 keyboard upgrade. When I pressed on the button for the upgrade, the screen only allowed me to uninstall, but no explanation or text.
 When I uninstalled the upgrade, the microphone icon reappeared.  voice to txt has returned.

No one on t mobile support staff at several sites and levels was aware of this upgrade problem for 3A.

drm
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
